name: CZAR: Decision
description:
CZAR: Decision is a mix RPG-VN game. You play the role of an inhabitant of Sriharja Kingdom named Sagara. He and his friends were involved in an incident sixth years ago where miasma burst out from the ruins, later the suspects were arrested. Today, the incident repeats, revealing the mystery and the truth of the past ...

System Minimum Requirements

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD A4 4000 APU or Intel Celeron B840
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5450 / Intel HD 2500 / Nvidia GT 420
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

This is Pre-Alpha Demo. The total game play around 60 to 90 minutes. Representing most of the Game Features such as Battle system and Visual Novel Choices. The dialogue using mainly Bahasa (Indonesian Language) aimed for Indonesia Game Pime 2019 Exhibition. English/International Release for the demo will be released around July-August 2019.

Feedbacks are appreciated!
